column5: Hello folks,  I'm hoping to go for pike tomorrow afternoon/evening, but I'm at a BBQ and party tonight in Acton.  I would like to find some Minnows in the Acton, Rockwood or Guelph area tomorrow.  I've tried most Guelph tackle shops and they seem to be closed.  First Choice Tackle MIGHT be open.  Does anyone know of any other places that I can get minnows at in the area?  Thanks in advance! Ryan
CTC and buy a dip net,LOL.There is a baitshop on 6 in guelgh.past the ctc going north on six.Before guelph lk rd.
That would be First Choice. There is also Kingsway a couple of clicks West as well.
the only place that might be open would be first choice kingsway is closed on sunday
I recall there being a guy in fergus,on the same rd as the bellwood lk conservation area entrance that sold minnows.

Theres another shop in Bullfrog Mall on Eramosa st. in Guelph...never been in but I was by yesterday and he has a live bait sign...might be worth checking out....First Choice usually has them and hes a great guy in there always good for some advice
